caption.p: The complete life cycle of SARS-Cov-2 inside the host cell. ACE2: Angiotensin-converting enzyme, RdRp: RNA-dependent RNA polymerase, ORF: Open reading frame, N: Nucleocapsid protein, M: Membrane protein, E: Envelope protein, S: Spike protein, RER: Rough Endoplasmic reticulum, SER: Smooth Endoplasmic reticulum, GC: Golgi apparatus.
